title: Aaron Lammer from Longform Podcast and Stoner
itunes:title: Aaron Lammer from Longform Podcast and Stoner
description:
Episode 257 - This is another one of my favorite type of guests, what I affectionately refer to as a “secret punk”. Aaron Lammer hosts the incredible podcasts Longform and Stoner as well as a contributing member of Francis & The Lights and we go deep into music listening habits, journalism and weed (which is a subject that I have no existing knowledge of but am really interested in the subculture). I loved this chat and hope you do as well. Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
